/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery over the urban landscape. Vehicles, including cars and buses, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and textures of the cityscape.
